Klasse Spieler

java.lang.Object
spiel.Spieler
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class Spieler extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player in the game, including their hand, score, and turn status.
Siehe auch:

      public boolean isAmZug()
      Checks whether it's currently this player's turn.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if it's the player's turn

    • setAmZug

      public void setAmZug(boolean amZug)
      Sets whether it's currently this player's turn.
      Parameter:
      amZug - true if the player should be marked as "on turn"

    • isBot

      public boolean isBot()
      Indicates whether this player is a bot.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the player is a bot, false if the player is a human
